title: The flea sic parua componere magnis.
author: Woodhouse, Peter, poet.
publisher: Printed [by Edward Allde] for Iohn Smethwick and are to be solde at his shop in Saint Dunstanes Churchyard in Fleet-street, vnder the Diall,
notes: "The epistle to the reader" signed: Peter Woodhouse.
Running title reads: Democritus his dreame.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
